Sql: select UserName, FirstName, LastName from Users
select UserName, FirstName, LastName from (Select * From Users) T
Select T.a,T.a d from Tab T
;With CTE AS (SELECT TOP (1000) [ABC] FROM [db].[dbo].[tab]), CTE2 AS (Select ABC from CTE) Select ABC, (select top 1 b from c) d From CTE2 Where ABC in (select top 1 b from c)
/* stuff */ Select a, d from b
Select a,(Select top 1 g from G) TopG From T
Select a, b From (Select a, b From c )T
Select a, b From T Where a in (select a from g)

;WITH cte_sales_amounts (staff, sales, year) AS ( SELECT first_name + ' ' + last_name, SUM(quantity * list_price * (1 - discount)), YEAR(order_date) FROM sales.orders o INNER JOIN sales.order_items i ON i.order_id = o.order_id INNER JOIN sales.staffs s ON s.staff_id =  o.staff_id GROUP BY first_name + ' ' + last_name, year(order_date) ) SELECT staff, sales FROM cte_sales_amounts WHERE year = 2018;
Select a, d into #t from b; Select a, d from #t
Delete from #t; Select a, d from #t
Drop table #t; Select a, d from #t
INSERT INTO #Alert_ProgramsTemp ([Program]) VALUES('s'); Select a, d from #t
UPDATE #Alert_ProgramsTemp SET [Program] = 'b' WHERE 1 = 0; Select a, d from #t
Select a, d into #t from b; go Select a, d from #t
Delete From  T; Select a from b;
Select a from b; Delete From  T
